about:
I am an enthusiastic and dedicated software developer with around 9 years of experience specializing in Angular, Node.js, React, and JavaScript frameworks. My passion for technology drives me to continuously learn and explore innovative solutions for complex problems. Over the years, I've worked on diverse projects, ranging from scalable data platforms to intuitive dashboards, showcasing my expertise in full-stack development and cloud-based solutions. 

I enjoy mentoring team members, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and delivering high-performance applications. When I'm not coding, I love diving into emerging technologies, reading about software design principles, and enhancing my skills. My goal is to contribute to impactful projects and continuously grow as a technology leader, ensuring seamless and robust solutions for businesses worldwide.
